Package uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp01.main.java.ui.controllers

Class GridDisplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp01.main.java.ui.controllers.GridDisplayer

  • public class GridDisplayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to help GameView display the grids. The grids are displayed in three forms which are all handled in this class. The Blocks change colour and functionality based on a state machine, and get added to the textField when clicked on.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      constructor for gird displayer with all the UI elements used to display the grid

      • GridDisplayer

        public GridDisplayer​(javafx.scene.control.TextField field,
                     javafx.scene.layout.GridPane[] two,
                     javafx.scene.layout.GridPane[] twoFive,
                     javafx.scene.SubScene sub,
                     javafx.scene.Group group,
                     javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane b,
                     javafx.scene.control.Button explode)
        constructor for gird displayer with all the UI elements used to display the grid
        Parameters:
        field - the text field to build the word in
        two - the 2D grid elements
        twoFive - the 2.5D view elements
        sub - the sub scene for the 3D view
        group - The group to hold the 3D view JavaFx objects
        b - the container of the subscene for the 3D view
        explode - the explode button so Icon can be changed based on if the cube is exploded or not.

      • buildGrids

        public void buildGrids​(java.lang.String[][][] letters)
        sets up 3d enviroment, loads letters into labels and boxes, adds them to the display.
        Parameters:
        letters - a 3x3x3 array of letters to populate the grid views.
